SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS MULTIPLE MEMBER COMPANIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE MEMBER COMPANIES ELECT AN EXECUTIVE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE BOARD MAKES RECOMMENDATIONS BUT HAS NO AUTHORITY. THE FINAL DECISION AND AUTHORITY RESTS WITH THE MEMBER COMPANIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S FORM 990 IS PROVIDED AT A BOARD MEETING FOR REVIEW AND APPROVAL PRIOR TO FILING WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION REQUIRES THAT THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY BE REVIEWED ANNUALLY AT THE BOARD MEETING. EVERY MEMBER IS PROVIDED A COPY OF THE POLICY TO REVIEW AND IS REQUIRED TO SIGN ACKNOWLEDING THAT HE/SHE RECEIVED AND UNDERSTOOD THE POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION THAT IS RECEIVED BY KEY EMPLOYEES IS DETERMINED, REVIEWED, AND APPROVED BY THE INDEPENDENT VOTING MEMBERS AT THE BOARD MEETINGS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST AT THE ORGANIZATION'S OFFICE DURING NORMAL BUSINESS HOURS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VII CONTACT ADDRESSES FOR OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, ETC
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DALE HILL - P.O. BOX 713, FUNKSTOWN, MD 21734. ROBERT MONCREIF - 7509 UNIVERSITY ROAD, BOONSBORO, MD 21713. DAVID "SKIP" MENZIES - 12204 BROOKFIELD AVENUE, HAGERSTOWN, MD 21740. SAM MURRAY - 13610 OVERHILL DRIVE, HAGERSTOWN, MD 21742. RICHARD C. BLAIR - 10921 ROESSNER AVENUE, HAGERSTOWN, MD 21740. DARYL LYNN HUNSBERGER - 11916 WELSH RUN ROAD, MERCERSBURG, PA 17236. RICK L. HEMPHILL - P.O. BOX 4610, HAGERSTOWN, MD 21740. RICHARD W. BOWER - 17602 CREST DRIVE, HAGERSTOWN, MD 21740.
THERE WAS NO CHANGE IN THE ORGANIZATION'S OVERSIGHT OR SELECTION PROCESS FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
